data.scheme_name: Special Provisions for Start-ups - Reimbursement and Interest Subsidy - Existing
data.benefits: Interest subsidy of 8% Reimbursement of 30% to 45% of lease rental subsidy 100% Net SGST Reimbursement for 7 years Assistance up to Rs 2.5 Lakh to Rs 5 Lakhs to attend acceleration programs 100% reimbursement of expenses incurred for cloud computing/storage.
data.eligibility:
1. The unit shall have filed Udyam Registration Certificate (URC) and Haryana Udyam Memorandum (HUM) shall be eligible under the Scheme and should be in commercial production. 
  2. Startups shall also be recognized and registered with DPIIT.
data.conditions:
1. The plant and machinery installed by the unit should be new or second hand imported machinery with residual life of ten years. 
  2. The unit should not have been placed in the restrictive list as mentioned under HEEP 2020. 
  3. The unit should have obtained NOC/Change of Land Use (CLU) from competent Authority if applicable. 
  4. The plant and machinery installed by the unit should be new or second hand imported machinery with residual life of ten years.
data.beneficiaries: The unit shall have filed Udyam Registration Certificate (URC) and Haryana Udyam Memorandum (HUM) shall be eligible under the Scheme and should be in commercial production.
data.prerequisites:
1. The plant and machinery installed by the unit should be new or second hand imported machinery with residual life of ten years. 
  2. The unit should not have been placed in the restrictive list as mentioned under HEEP 2020. 
  3. The unit should have obtained NOC/Change of Land Use (CLU) from competent Authority if applicable. Application needs to be submitted within three months from the date of start of operation.
data.nodal_agency: Directorate of Micro, Small & Medium Enterprises, Haryana
data.context: The scheme aims to give a further thrust to the promotion of startups and strengthening the ecosystem in the State.
data.objective: To encourage startups, innovation and entrepreneurship.
data.description:
1. Interest subsidy of 8%, maximum up to Rs 20 lakh per year for a period of 5 years. 
  2. Reimbursement of 30% of lease rental subsidy for general and 45% for startups with only women founders, period of 1 year up to Rs 5 Lakh 100% .
  3. Net SGST Reimbursement for 7 years with cap of 150%. 
  4. FCI Support startups up to Rs 2.5 Lakh to attend national acceleration programs and Rs 5 Lakh for international acceleration programs. 
  5. 100% reimbursement of expenses incurred for cloud computing/storage on Haryana based Data Centers up to Rs 1 Lakh per startup per annum for a period of 3 years.
data.how_to_apply:
1. Application in prescribed Form for Financial Assistance for setting up Research and Development Center for all enterprises along with listed documents would be submitted to the Director/ Director General, Industries & Commerce/Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises, through the web portal of the department.
  2.  Interest Subsidy to be applied under “Interest Subsidy Scheme” under HEEP 2020 SGST reimbursement to be applied under “Scheme for Investment Subsidy in lieu of Net SGST” under HEEP 2020.
data.funding_facilitator: Directorate of Micro, Small & Medium Enterprises, Haryana
data.funding_mechanism:
1. The application would be processed and examined by the Joint Director/Deputy Director, District Industries Centre/ District MSME Centre. 
  2. The Director/ Director General, Industries & Commerce/Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises shall be competent authority for sanction of the subsidy within 30 days from the date of completion of the claim.
data.additional_info:
Link of list of Restrictive Industries in Haryana: https://www.hsiidc.org.in/uploads/estate_managements/170097742718HEEP%20restrictive%20list.pdf
Categorization of Blocks : https://investharyana.in/content/pdfs/Re-categorization%20of%20blocks%2015.11.2018.pdf
data.checklist_info_a:
Udyam Registration Certificate (URC)
Haryana Udhyam Memorandum (HUM)
NOC/CLU (No Objection Certificate/Change of Land Use)
Haryana Resident Certificate (for local employment benefits)
ESI/PF Registration Number
Proof of Commercial Production
Financial Statements (Balance Sheet, Profit & Loss Statement)
Import-Exporter Code (IEC)
Registration-cum-Membership Certificate (RCMC) from Export Promotion Council
Land Documents (ownership or lease agreement)
Environmental Clearances (if applicable)
Zero Defect Zero Effect (ZED) Certification
Proof of Investment (in machinery/equipment)
Electricity Bills (for electricity-related incentives)
Energy Audit Report (for energy efficiency claims)
Other Miscellaneous Documents (as per specific schemes)
data.checklist_info_d:
Address :  Sh. Deepak Burak , Directorate of MSME
Phone No: 8699888828
Email-id deepakbura.etd@hry.gov.in
data.beneficiary: All Industry - All Entities - Haryana - All MSMEs and Non MSMEs
